[[File:Majestic Camping Add-On Key Art.jpg|thumb|300px|key art]]
'''Majestic Camping''' is an add-on developed by YouTuber ''[[Jordan Maron|CaptainSparklez]]'' for the [[Beyond the Pale Garden]] event.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Turn scary nights cozy with Majestic Camping! Build your own colorful tents, hammock, and campfire, then enjoy s'mores under the amazing Aurora Borealis. Detect nearby mobs with the new Mob Detector and light up the world with your Flashlight, while fairies and owls add a magical touch to your environment!<br><br>+ Customizable Tents<br>+ Aurora Borealis & Fairies<br>+ Relaxing Fun|Minecraft.net description}}
